subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Colorado shortstop Troy Tulowitzki turned an unassisted triple play yesterday, and the Rockies beat the visiting Atlanta Braves, 9-7, on Matt Holliday’s two-run homer in the 11th inning.
snippet: Colorado shortstop Troy Tulowitzki turned an unassisted triple play yesterday, and the Rockies beat the visiting Atlanta Braves, 9-7, on Matt Holliday’s two-run homer in the 11th inning.
